North_Las_Vegas.Las Vegas Convention Center:
The Las Vegas Convention Center (commonly referred to as LVCC) is a government building in Winchester, Nevada. It is owned and operated by the Las Vegas Convention and Visitors Authority.
Being one of the largest convention centers in the world with 1,940,631 sq ft (180,290.5 m2) of exhibit space, it hosts shows with an estimated 200,000 participants.
